/pbcoreInstantiation/instantiationIdentifier[not(@source)]
	dirty-yes-fix-no-instantiation-identifier-location-mediaType.xml
/pbcoreInstantiation/instantiationMediaType[. != "Moving Image" and . != "Sound" and . != "other"]
	dirty-yes-fix-no-instantiation-identifier-location-mediaType.xml
/pbcoreInstantiation[not(instantiationIdentifier)]
	dirty-yes-fix-no-instantiation-identifier-location-mediaType.xml
/pbcoreInstantiation[not(instantiationLocation)]
	dirty-yes-fix-no-instantiation-identifier-location-mediaType.xml
/pbcoreInstantiation[not(instantiationMediaType)]
	dirty-yes-fix-no-instantiation-identifier-location-mediaType.xml
